descriptions: ["DescriptionFortune 5\xa0presents\xa0GRAND VIEWS, a READY TO MOVE -IN premium villa and townhouse, secure gated community in the heart of MBR City. \xa0Grand Views is the second successfully completed and delivered horizontal luxury living development by G&CO, pioneers in Meydan. \xa0The townhouses at Grand Views are elegant in design and contemporary in feel with premium quality finishes resonating a unique mix of form and function. All townhouses have 4 en-suite bedrooms with 1 on the ground floor. Additionally kitchens are fully fitted and designed by \xa0Poggen Pol. A separate maids\x92 room, spacious garden and roof top terraces are what make Grand Views townhouses stand out from others.  Feature Highlights:G+1 Townhouses4 BR+ Maid's roomFully equipped modular kitchen (designed by Poggen Pohl)Fully fitted modern bathroomsContemporary styled finishes (Glass and Stainless-Steel Railings)Elegant flooring in the living and dining roomsPremium standard hard wood parquet flooring in all bedroomsOutside two car parking and private gardenUsable roof top terraceContact us to set up a viewing."]
